column4: okie, do I want java 5.0 or java 6 to have Java in my browser ?
java6 supposedly helps Firefox be a bit more stable
so which packages do I want for it ?
first - that's just what I was told, so take it with a grain of salt :) - second - search aptitude or Synaptic for 'sun-java6-plugin' -- you might want the JRE also while you're there
